name: Millitaur
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 13

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The millitaur makes two Handaxe attacks.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Poisonous Flask (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The millitaur hastily combines alchemical substances into a poisonous concoction and throws it at a point the millitaur can see within 30 feet. Each creature within 15 feet of that point must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 14 (4d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn't poisoned. A poisoned creature can make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Healing Tonic (2/Day)
actions.desc: The millitaur administers a healing tonic to a willing creature within 5 feet of it. The target magically regains 7 (2d6) hp and is freed from any disease or poison.
